messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine the Great Pacific Mall with 15 stores. Starbucks, Paris Baguette, H&M, Zara, and Sephora are all connected to each other. Pete’s Coffee, Carter Children, Nike, Sephora, and Bath and Body Works are connected to each other. Chickflea, Baskins and Robins, Levis, GNC Live Well, and Nike are all connected to each other. Marshalls, Paris Baguette, H&M, Zara, and Target are connected to each other. Carter Children, Nike, Sephora, and Bath and Body Works are connected to each other. Baskins and Robins, Levis, GNC Live Well, and Target are connected to each other. Paris Baguette, H&M, and Zara are connected to each other. Nike is connected to Bath and Body Works. Levis, GNC Live Well and Target are connected to each other. H&M is connected to Zara. Sephora is connected to Bath and Body Works. GNC Live Well is connected to Target. You are in Starbucks and you find a magic coffee bean with which you can teleport to any room only once. At the same time, you have been told that the path between Starbucks and Sephora is now closed for cleaning. From Starbucks, what is the path that yields the most reward? Please list the store names in order, separated by commas.

To maximize the reward, we need to find the store that is farthest from Starbucks but still reachable from it. Since we can only teleport once, we want to make the most out of it by visiting the maximum number of stores that are not connected to each other. 

Starting at Starbucks, we can teleport to Marshalls, which is not directly connected to any of the stores that Starbucks is connected to. From there, we can visit Target, which is connected to Levis, GNC Live Well, and Baskin and Robins, which are not directly connected to any of the stores that Starbucks is connected to. Finally, we can visit Chickflea, which is connected to Baskin and Robins, Levis, and GNC Live Well, which are also not directly connected to any of the stores that Starbucks is connected to. 

Therefore, the path that yields the most reward is: Starbucks, Marshalls, Target, Baskin and Robins, Levis, GNC Live Well, and Chickflea.

Answer: Starbucks, Marshalls, Target, Baskin and Robins, Levis, GNC Live Well, Chickflea.

teleDetour.parsed_response: Answer: Starbucks, Marshalls, Target, Baskin and Robins, Levis, GNC Live Well, Chickflea
